          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection currents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektionströme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courants de convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Correntes do convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correnti di convezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεύματα μεταφοράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corrientes de la convección</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the movement of hot and cold water produces convection currents.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die Bewegung des 
heißen und kalten Wassers Konvektionströme produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le mouvement de 
l'eau chaude et froide produit des courants de convection.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o movimento da 
água quente e fria produz correntes do convection.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il movimento di 
acqua calda e fredda produce le correnti di convezione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η μετακίνηση του 
καυτού και κρύου νερού παράγει τα ρεύματα μεταφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el movimiento de 
la agua caliente y fría produce corrientes de la convección.</string>
          </description>
